parameters.name: AliasName
parameters.description: The alias of the vulnerability that you want to query.

parameters.name: CurrentPage
parameters.description: The number of the page to return.

parameters.name: Lang
parameters.description:
The language of the content within the request and response. Default value: **zh**. Valid values:

*   **zh**: Chinese.
*   **en**: English.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries per page. Default value: 20.

parameters.name: Source
parameters.description:
The source of the whitelist. Valid values:
- **image**
- **agentless**
